properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNO, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NICKNAME , NOTICE_TITLE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NICKNAME , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') "CREATE_DATE" , COUNT FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_B = 'NOTICE' AND REF_BNO = ?
